title: Crime Alert 12.08.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.08.21
description:
An ambulance driver crashes his car, killing the patient he is transporting. A woman uses the obituaries to rob innocent family members of the deceased.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
